00015 #ifndef __MEZZO_RTNODE__
00016 #define __MEZZO_RTNODE__
00017 
00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 
00020 namespace Mezzo {
00021 
00022 class BufferGroup;
00023 class Buffer;
00024 
00025 class RTNode {
00026 public:
00027    RTNode():next(NULL),connections(NULL),numInPorts(0),numOutPorts(0),tmpOutBuffers(NULL){}
00028    virtual void Prepare() { }
00029    virtual void Run(int bufSize, BufferGroup *g, float **inBuffers, float **outBuffers) = 0;
00030    virtual void Finish() { }
00031 
00032 protected:
00033    void SetNumPorts(int inPorts, int outPorts)
00034    {
00035       if(tmpOutBuffers) delete tmpOutBuffers;
00036       tmpOutBuffers = new float*[outPorts];
00037 
00038       numInPorts = inPorts;
00039       numOutPorts = outPorts;
00040    }
00041 
00042 private:
00043    class RTNode *next;
00044    struct Connection {
00045       RTNode *from;
00046       int fromTheirPort;
00047       int toMyPort;
00048       Connection *next;
00049    } *connections;
00050    int numInPorts, numOutPorts;
00051    float **tmpOutBuffers;
00052    friend class RTGraph;
00053 };
00054 
00055 } // namespace Mezzo
00056 
00057 #endif
